description:
This package is deprecated as Prusa Research has renamed their Slicer from Slic3r Prusa Edition to PrusaSlicer.

Use the **prusaslicer package** instead.

This package exists only for backward compatibility to provide a transitional dummy package for existing users and scripts which may still use this package ID.
summary: Slic3r Prusa Edition is the default slicer shipped with our driver package. Prusa Edition is forked from original Slic3r to speed up the development and release cycle.
author: Alessandro Ranellucci,  Prusa Research
